      • saveCalibrationData

        public boolean saveCalibrationData(java.io.File file)
        This method saves the particular calibration data, of a given camera, as an XML file in disk.
        Parameters:
        file - File object with the information about the XML file to save.
        rgbs - array containing the information about the RGB colors from each box in the colorchecker.
        Returns:
        boolean, represents if file was saved correctly or not.

      • loadCalibrationData

        public boolean loadCalibrationData(java.io.File file)
        This method loads, to the application, the calibration data of a particular camera, saved as an XML file in disk.
        Parameters:
        file - File object with the information about the XML file to read.
        Returns:
        boolean, represents if the file was added successfully or not.

        public boolean loadTrainingSet(java.io.File file,
                               java.lang.String classifierType)
        Loads a training set previously saved.
        Parameters:
        file - The location of the file with the training set.

      • loadImagesForTraining

        public int loadImagesForTraining(java.io.File folder)
        Loads the image file names from the given folder.
        Parameters:
        folder - This is the location where the fruit images are located.

      • processTrainingSet

        public void processTrainingSet(java.io.File destinationFile,
                               ProgressUpdatable progress)
        This method has to be called after loadImagesForTraining, it extracts the image features and creates a new training set.
        Parameters:
        destinationFile - The file where the training set will be saved.

      • trainClassifier

        public boolean trainClassifier(java.io.File savedTrainingSet,
                               java.io.File destinationFile,
                               java.lang.String technique,
                               java.lang.String classifier)
        This method has to be called if either processTrainingSet or loadTrainingSet have been called.
        Parameters:
        destinationFile - The file where the model will be saved.
        type - The type of machine learning to use for building the new model.
